game.name: Become a mechanic
game.description:
You have definitely come at the right place in case if repairing things is your best hobby and becoming a professional mechanic is your dream. Join Become a Mechanic and be prepared to take control of your own garage in the virtual world! The enrollment in this arcade game will allow you to discover and practice multiple vehicle repair activities. Try to repair as many vehicles of your clients as you can to create your best score! It is a wonderful chance to become a champion of the mechanics.

On your garage, many clients will come to get their vehicles repaired. Take the keys of their vehicles before placing their vehicles on the right place! Start by turning on the diagnostic machine and then check if they need the spare-part suppliers! Your final step is to get the motorcycle or car repaired. Make sure to hand over the bill to your clients. Be polite and lenient while giving their bills as your prices of service could make a grown man faint.

Try to repair as many vehicles as possible and create your best score through sixty levels in this cool html5 garage game! Challenge your sharp reflexes and complete all the tasks in each level to become the king of the mechanics! There are 60 unique and challenging levels to play through, and 180 stars to collect. Good luck to get all the repair jobs done on time to become the best mechanic of your town! Play more garage games that are free to play online without download!
game.metaTitle: Become a mechanic, Garage Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Become a mechanic at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
